author: as:ez.no
msg: - Added a fix to the fix for issue #14025, because gmail and other mail
clients ignore the Content-Disposition header in favor of Content-Type.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Fixed issue #14055: Parsing an empty string raises a warning.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Added some documentation about adding directories to an archive.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Added a test for appending empty directories to a zip archive.
